openconnector

Class FilteredIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • openconnector.FilteredIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>

    public class FilteredIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>
    An iterator that wraps another iterator and filters such that the returned objects must match the provided filter.

    If possible, Connector implementations should natively implement filtering by querying rather than using a FilterIterator. A FilterIterator can be slow an resource intensive.
